channel.title: Is there a way I can also include height in teleport

item.title: Is there a way I can also include height in teleport
item.dc:creator: @Zoolander Zoolander
item.description:
@Zoolander wrote:

What i would like to do is make it so that when i click on a ladder it rasies me to second floor, so far for object causeing teleport i have got things like

if ((objectID == 6724) &&(objectX == 3545) && (objectY == 9695)) // west door in east room
{
teleportToX = 3540;
teleportToY = 9695;
}

Is there away to add a third teleport coordinate on there for height?

Read full topic
item.source: Is there a way I can also include height in teleport
